title: Marketing Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ARRAY
Interview Descriptions: I did the first interview, and overall, it was pretty conversational. They got to know a bit about me and what I enjoy in marketing as well as described the work that would be done.
Interview Questions: Q: What is something you’ve done in marketing in your previous experiences that you’re proud of?

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: I applied through a friend and first received an informal interview a couple of days later with the assistant leaving. Then went to a more formal interview with the executive whose desk I will be covering. Turn around for interviews was fast.
Interview Questions: What my background is in film and television

title: Farm Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at ARRAY
Interview Descriptions: Great interview process. There were a few different interviews you had to complete. Each interview was professional but also relaxed to get to know you better. Since I was from out of state they toom me out to eat and showed me around the farm.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself in a few minutes.

title: Motivational Speaker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ARRAY (New Delhi) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: There is a simple interview  they don't ask me very tough question all the questions are very easy and interview in English language and after all the question they tell me that they will inform me if I am selected that's the end of my interview
